metadata.title: SAWMONG Hamster Mini Bed, Warm Small Pets Animals House Bedding, Lightweight Cotton Sofa for Dwarf Hamster
features: 【Benefits】: The comfortable hamster bed can keep your little pet warm and make it feel comfortable. The product is not just a hamster bed, it is also a small pet sofa, which is providing a relaxing place for your pet to rest and live.
【Unique Design】: The hamster cotton bed is set with cute animal ear shapes on the top, which makes your small pet become more cute and attractive.

High Quality】: Our hamster cozy sofa is made of crystal velvet, which is soft and comfortable. The inside is filled with high-density sponge, which is not easy to collapse and has good air permeability, which brings a comfortable experience to your pet.
【Convenient to Clean】: Our hamster sofa is washable and very easy to clean, and you can also take out the cotton pad inside for cleaning.

【Mini Bed】: The hamster cotton nest is about 3.5" L x 3.5"W x 3.9" H (not including the length of the ears). It provides a comfortable resting place for your little pets, which is only suitable for hamsters.
description: Pets need careful care, especially small pets. Because they are so small and adorable, they are susceptible to various influences from the outside world, such as the weather. Our small pet sofa nest uses high-quality fabrics and unique designs Bring your pets a safe and comfortable resting place.
Allow them to experience life and enjoy themselves freely and easily.

Why choose us? -Use high-quality fabrics, bring a wonderful experience to your pet.  -Use a unique shape design to create a cute shape, making your cute little pet more cute and eye-catching.  -Easy to clean, the removable cotton pad and washable feature make cleaning small pet sofas very simple. -The appropriate size (3.5"L x 3.5W x 3.9"H, not including the ears) make the life of small pets more comfortable. Come and try our products, let your small pet get more care!
